sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an isosceles triangle.
message_1: A mathematics student needs to determine the length of the third side in an isosceles triangle, where the length of each of the two equal sides is 7 cm. What is the length of the third side in cm?
message_2: To find the length of the third side in an isosceles triangle, we need more information. Specifically, we need either the angle between the two equal sides or the height of the triangle. Please provide one of these pieces of information.
